aed4acbb-4c47-4ad3-b21e-c2767af79f0c.description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated the knowledge, skills, and expertise needed to perform critical payroll and related tasks as an ADP Workforce Now Payroll practitioner. Earners are able to perform advanced features and tasks to process a company’s payroll using ADP Workforce Now. They can competently use ADP Workforce Now to maintain employee information, add special deductions, issue special payments, reconcile tax deductions, and verify output using payroll reports.
aed4acbb-4c47-4ad3-b21e-c2767af79f0c.name: Certified Payroll Specialist in ADP Workforce Now®

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the ADP Certified Payroll Specialist in ADP Workforce Now® exam
Have at least 6 months experience using ADP Workforce Now® (recommended)
Complete basic ADP Workforce Now product training and, optionally, complete up to three skills refresher courses

c5e4ef44-cd44-4741-9416-dee786c222f3.description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated the knowledge, skills, and expertise needed to perform critical human resources and related tasks as an ADP Workforce Now HR practitioner. Earners are able to perform advanced features and tasks to establish and maintain employee records in ADP Workforce Now. They can use ADP Workforce Now to hire an employee, maintain employee status, change employee information, set up and maintain a corporate structure, and track government compliance.
c5e4ef44-cd44-4741-9416-dee786c222f3.name: Certified Human Resources Specialist in ADP Workforce Now®

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the ADP Certified Human Resources Specialist  in ADP Workforce Now® exam
Have at least 6 months experience using ADP Workforce Now (recommended)
Complete basic ADP Workforce Now product training and, optionally, complete a skills refresher course

ba8a6cb0-5162-4931-995d-9e4bf70faa84.description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated the knowledge, skills, and expertise needed to perform critical tasks as a Certified Partner in RUN Powered by ADP®. Earners are able to perform advanced tasks, implement a new company and process a company’s payroll using RUN Powered by ADP®. They can competently use RUN Powered by ADP® to enter pay information, maintain employee information and perform other tasks such as manual checks and adjustments.
ba8a6cb0-5162-4931-995d-9e4bf70faa84.name: Certified Partner in RUN Powered by ADP® for Partners

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the RUN Powered by ADP for Partners Sales soft skills course
Passed the RUN for Partners Certified Specialist Exam

db0da8c7-179e-4205-b23b-4f223be13dcb.description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated the knowledge, skills, and expertise needed to perform critical time and attendance and related tasks as an ADP Workforce Now Time & Attendance practitioner. Earners are able to manage employee's reported time, resolve timecard exceptions, and create and assign schedules. They are competent in maintaining employee time and attendance information, running standard time reports, and using reports to verify data and correct timecard errors.
db0da8c7-179e-4205-b23b-4f223be13dcb.name: Certified Time & Attendance Specialist in ADP Workforce Now®

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the ADP Certified Time & Attendance Specialist in ADP Workforce Now® exam
Have at least 6 months experience using ADP Workforce Now (recommended)
Complete basic ADP Workforce Now product training and, optionally, complete a skills refresher course

83d835dc-7346-4bb4-ac97-b127d5ec9830.description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated the knowledge, skills, and expertise needed to perform critical payroll and related tasks as an ADP Vantage HCM Payroll practitioner. Earners are able to perform advanced features and tasks to process a company’s payroll using ADP Vantage HCM. They can competently use ADP Vantage HCM to enter pay information, create and import pay data, enter a pay data batch, maintain employee information and other tasks such as manual checks and adjustments.
83d835dc-7346-4bb4-ac97-b127d5ec9830.name: Certified Payroll Specialist in ADP Vantage HCM®

badge_template_activities.title: Must have passed the Certified Payroll Specialist exam  in ADP Vantage HCM®
Have at least 6 months experience using ADP Vantage HCM (required)
Complete basic ADP Vantage HCM® product training and, optionally, complete up to three skills refresher courses

7fc80faf-2d29-4cf7-a131-d222a5cc65f8.description: Earners of the WFN Voice of the Employee Solution Certified badge know how to help organizations listen to employees and build connections through feedback. Earners can describe ways that analyzing employee sentiment can drive change, process improvement, and better business outcomes. They can explain how survey results can be benchmarked, compared over time and locations, and used as insights to identify areas of opportunity when creating action plans.
7fc80faf-2d29-4cf7-a131-d222a5cc65f8.name: ADP Workforce Now Voice of the Employee Solution Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on a comprehensive assessment.

46569ea6-5542-4f39-bf01-6036a23d451f.description: Earners of the ADP Workforce Intelligent Self-Service Solution Certified badge can describe how organizations can anticipate, reduce, and solve common issues before they even happen. ADP Workforce Now Intelligent Self-Service has a digital experience across mobile and desktop designed to elevate the employee experience and reduce practitioners’ administrative workload.
46569ea6-5542-4f39-bf01-6036a23d451f.name: ADP Workforce Now Intelligent Self-Service Solution Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on a comprehensive assessment.

ec2bee06-e887-42f0-9c61-e6548ac37d30.description: Earners of the ADP Workforce Now Decision Support Solution Certified badge can describe how organizations can improve employee engagement by personalizing the benefits experience. WFN Decisions Support uses a guided process that includes a series of questions to create a personalized best fit recommendation for each individual.
ec2bee06-e887-42f0-9c61-e6548ac37d30.name: ADP Workforce Now Decision Support Solution Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on a comprehensive assessment.

ad449f95-6d84-4f49-a2e6-98a1d76e71df.description: Earners of the WFN Carrier Connections Solution Certified badge can describe how organizations can save time, money, and improve accuracy by streamlining and automating benefit enrollments with insurance carriers. They can explain the ease of configuration, the advantages of real-time connections, and the key benefits for both employees and the organization.
ad449f95-6d84-4f49-a2e6-98a1d76e71df.name: ADP Workforce Now Carrier Connections Solution Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on a comprehensive assessment.

99cb697e-39f7-4de3-b707-b8bf2c049912.description: Earners of the ADP Workforce Now DataCloud Solution Certified badge can describe how ADP DataCloud will equip organizations with convenient access to their people data in one place with easy-to-use data visualization, interactive reports and dashboards, and the industry's largest workforce dataset for benchmarking.
99cb697e-39f7-4de3-b707-b8bf2c049912.name: ADP Workforce Now DataCloud Solution Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on a comprehensive assessment.

b61055bc-7092-4ceb-887c-df808862c374.description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated the knowledge, skills, and expertise needed to perform critical payroll and related tasks as an ADP® iHCM Payroll Cloud practitioner. Earners are able to perform advanced features and tasks to process a company’s payroll using ADP® iHCM Payroll Cloud. They can competently use ADP® iHCM Payroll Cloud to use company setup options, user preferences, payroll system options, year-end processing tasks, completing adjustments and advanced features.
b61055bc-7092-4ceb-887c-df808862c374.name: Certified Payroll Specialist in ADP® iHCM Payroll Cloud for UK

badge_template_activities.title: Have at least 6 months of experience using ADP® iHCM Payroll Cloud in the UK (recommended)
Complete basic ADP® iHCM Payroll Cloud product training
Pass the Certified Specialist in ADP® iHCM Payroll Cloud for the UK exam

4e226716-1b10-4e87-82e1-bc0a94e0f2e8.description: Earners of the ADP Workforce Now Payroll Solution Certified badge understand how ADP Workforce Now Payroll can help an organization by saving time and improve accuracy through automated processes. Earners are able to define how this translates to a better payroll practitioner experience while helping companies support compliance obligations and increase employee satisfaction by executing payroll with confidence & flexibility.
4e226716-1b10-4e87-82e1-bc0a94e0f2e8.name: ADP Workforce Now Payroll Solution Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on a comprehensive assessment.

0695a1bd-fd0f-4292-a90f-a19fa96b9924.description: Earners of the ADP Workforce Now Recruitment Solution Certified badge are able to identify how Workforce Now Recruitment will help companies attract the best candidates with intelligent and easy to use tools, all in a single platform. Earners can demonstrate effectiveness in translating Workforce Now Recruitment into a better hiring experience, leading to employee satisfaction & ease of hiring while allowing employers to stay competitive.
0695a1bd-fd0f-4292-a90f-a19fa96b9924.name: ADP Workforce Now Recruitment Solution Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on a comprehensive assessment.

0ed2ca75-162d-4cc7-a917-e227eeedbe16.description: Earners of the ADP Workforce Now Zip Recruiter Solution Certified badge can articulate the recruiting process and how an easy flexible job posting can be with ZipRecruiter allowing organizations to receive unlimited candidates. Earners can demonstrate knowledge of data insights such as cost-to-hire and time-to-hire and how that data is most relevant to an organization.
0ed2ca75-162d-4cc7-a917-e227eeedbe16.name: ADP Workforce Now Zip Recruiter Solution Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on a comprehensive assessment.

115090d4-3eca-4d5a-987a-1223c790bb2e.description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated the knowledge, skills, and expertise needed to perform critical tasks as a Certified Partner in ADP Accountant Connect ℠. Earners are able to perform advanced tasks, utilize a broad array of Accountant Connect features, and use various tools to support their clients. They can competently use Accountant Connect to connect to their clients, access payroll reports, and connect to widely recognized industry tools.
115090d4-3eca-4d5a-987a-1223c790bb2e.name: Certified Partner in ADP Accountant Connect

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Certified Partner in Accountant Connect learning path
Achieve a passing score on the Certified Partner in ADP Accountant Connect exam.

c632f96a-f461-476b-9391-cab5b8b0fb0b.description: By earning this Leading Standout Teams Team Leader certification, you have demonstrated the commitment to leadership based on the strengths based principles of the Standout philosophy. You have exhibited an ability to help your team establish powerful connections, while also building trust & providing support through meaningful recognition, strengths acknowledgment & a focus on priorities. You possess the knowledge of how to set clear expectations on role clarity, collaboration & goal alignment.
c632f96a-f461-476b-9391-cab5b8b0fb0b.name: Leading Standout Teams Certified Team Leader

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Leading StandOut Teams Certification Exam. Prerequisite to sit for the exam: Completion of the self-study curriculum and peer review assignments located on the Coursera platform.
